nodes.text: Qixoni crystal was a type of crystal. Master Codebreaker's suit featured cufflink mountings made of Qixoni crystal.

Qixoni crystal was added to the new Star Wars canon via Daniel Wallace's 2018 reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide. The crystal was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity as part of the 2004 Obsidian Entertainment video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords.
